txt.en: 'The alarms sounded from here. I am glad you made it out of Cair Andros, but the element of surprise is no longer at our advantage. Perhaps it is time to take action.'
Molvagúr, captain of the Enemy forces at Cair Andros, is somewhere on the island.\n\nYou should find Molvagúr.
Duinhir can be found near Cair Andros.\n\nYou should speak to Duinhir.
Molvagúr, with swords drawn, snarls at you
Molvagúr, is on Cair Andros.\n\nYou should defeat Molvagúr.
Talk to Duinhir near Cair Andros
Leading a band of Gondorians, Duinhir, lord of Blackroot Vale, has been tasked with the retaking of Cair Andors.
In his last, dying breath, Molvagúr sounds the alarms!

'We know little of the captain whom the Enemy has appointed to command in Cair Andros - what nature of Man or Orc or where he makes camp upon the island - save his name, which is Molvagúr, and that his defeat would surely throw off the line of command. Damrod has espied not only Orcs in Cair Andros, but Haradrim and Sûhalar as well. With no head to unify them, there would be very little to keep them from fighting amongst themselves.'
